translations.brand.name: MPG.PuRe.en
translations.batch.logs.details.fill.all: Fill batch with all items from the log
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_AUTHENTICATIO: You need to be logged in, to change the publication.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_AUTHORIZATION: You do not have the privileges to change the publication.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_CONTEXT_NOT_F: The specified context was not found.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_FILES_METADAT: The given initial value does not match the value in the file metadata.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_INTERNAL_ERRO: An internal error occurred during the batch processing.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_ITEM_NOT_FOUN: The publication was not found anymore.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_CHAN: Unable to set new value. Possible reasons are restrictions to the context or the publication.
The given initial value does not match the value in the publication metadata.
Either the selected person was not found in the data or the ORCID ID already matches.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_NO_C: No initial value was set. For a replacing function the values must differ.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_STATE_WRONG: The publication cannot be changed due to the current state of the publication or its context.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_VALIDATION_IN:
The ORCID ID from $2 is not specified in the correct format:
-> $1
Please change it in CONE.
translations.BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_VALIDATION_IP: An attached file is missing the IP range.
